text:
Hi - I’m using <https://github.com/thefrontside/emberx-select>, which works fine from the app in Chrome but when running the default generated component test it doesn't seem to have registered.  I’ve run `ember g emberx-select` and also registered the helper in my test-helper.js file  as indicated on the README. ```import registerSelectHelper from './helpers/register-select-helper';
registerSelectHelper();```   I get this error on running the test:  <http://localhost:7357/assets/test-support.js:5578:20>: Assertion Failed: A helper named `x-select` could not be found"

attachments.title: thefrontside/emberx-select
attachments.text: emberx-select - Select component for Ember based on the native html select element.
